PSTN
PSTN Access Code
*00 Key pattern to use the PSTN line.
Route Call to PSTN 0
Outbound calls will be routed to PSTN port when dialed digits match.

Outbound calls will be routed to PSTN port when dialed digits match.

Forward to PSTN
VoIP calls will be forwarded to the specified PSTN number.
Forward to VoIP
PSTN calls will be forwarded to the specified VoIP number.
PIN for PSTN Calls
Enter digits to authorize calling PSTN numbers from VoIP.
PIN for VoIP Calls
Enter digits to authorize calling VoIP terminals from PSTN.
Forward to PSTN
VoIP calls will be forwarded to the specified PSTN number.
Forward to VoIP
PSTN calls will be forwarded to the specified VoIP number.
Number of Rings
4 Number of phone rings before a PSTN incoming call is forwarded.

Phonebook
Phonebook XML Download
No0
Yes, HTTP1
Yes, TFTP2
0 Enable downloading a phonebook in XML format.
Phonebook Server Path
Path to the XML file that contains the directory. Must be in the host/path format (dir.example.com/path).
Phonebook Download Interval
Number of hours between downlods. Must be between 0 and 720.
Remove Manually Edited Entries
0 When downloading the phonebook, remove manually edited entries.
XML Idel Screen
No0
Yes, HTTP1
Yes, TFTP2
0 Enable downloading an idle screen in XML format.
Idle Screen Server Path
Path to the XML file that contains the idel screen. Must be in the host/path foramt (dir.example.com/path).
XML App Server Path
Path to the XML file that contains the application. Must be in the host/path foramt (dir.example.com/path).
Softkey Label
Progress Tones
Ring Tone
f1=440,f2=480,c=200/400; Syntax: f1=val,f2=val[,c=on1/off1[-on2/off2[-on3/off3]]]; (Frequencies are in Hz and cadence on and off are in 10ms).
Dial Tone
f1=350,f2=440; Syntax: f1=val,f2=val[,c=on1/off1[-on2/off2[-on3/off3]]]; (Frequencies are in Hz and cadence on and off are in 10ms).
Message Waiting
f1=350,f2=440,c=10/10; Syntax: f1=val,f2=val[,c=on1/off1[-on2/off2[-on3/off3]]]; (Frequencies are in Hz and cadence on and off are in 10ms).
Ring Back Tone
f1=440,f2=480,c=200/400; Syntax: f1=val,f2=val[,c=on1/off1[-on2/off2[-on3/off3]]]; (Frequencies are in Hz and cadence on and off are in 10ms).
Call Waiting Tone
f1=440,f2=440,c=25/525; Syntax: f1=val,f2=val[,c=on1/off1[-on2/off2[-on3/off3]]]; (Frequencies are in Hz and cadence on and off are in 10ms).
Busy Tone
f1=480,f2=620,c=50/50; Syntax: f1=val,f2=val[,c=on1/off1[-on2/off2[-on3/off3]]]; (Frequencies are in Hz and cadence on and off are in 10ms).
Reorder Tone
f1=480,f2=620,c=25/25; Syntax: f1=val,f2=val[,c=on1/off1[-on2/off2[-on3/off3]]]; (Frequencies are in Hz and cadence on and off are in 10ms).
